full_summary:
## Government Tender Notice - PSIB RFB for Office Furniture
### English
### French

#### Reference Information

* Reference Number: PW-22-01016850
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: 1000031436
* Publication Date: December 13, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: December 23, 2022

#### Tender Overview
The Department of Justice Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal under the PSIB stream for the procurement of office furniture, including interconnecting panels, height-adjustable desk/table products, ancillary and lighting products, and collaborative furniture. This procurement is set aside for Aboriginal businesses under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. The procurement is also exempt from international trade agreements under Article 800 of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

#### Requirements
The tender includes a statement of requirement and basis of payment, which can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website. The procurement requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture in Ottawa, Ontario by March 31, 2023.

#### Contact Information
* Name: Jeff Williams
* Email: [Jeff.Williams@justice.gc.ca](mailto:Jeff.Williams@justice.gc.ca)
* Phone: 236-335-2084

* RFQ Document: [1000031436_RFB_EN.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/13/ddaa0af32d5df31c16f5d22fa5083d57/1000031436_rfb_en.pdf)

Note: The English text is for reference only and the French text is the official text. 

#### Note
This tender is now expired and is no longer acceptable for submission. Please note that the information provided is for reference purposes only and may not be current or accurate. Interested parties may refer to Canada Buys for further information and available tender opportunities.
